077/**
078 * Symbol picker activity. Sends selected symbol ID back to activity initialized from
079 */
080public class SymbolPickerActivity extends Activity {
081    public static final String selectedSymbolIdKey = "selectedSymbolIdKey";
082    public static final String modifiersKey = "modifiersKey";
083    public static final String attributesKey = "attributesKey";
084    public static final String supportedVersionsKey = "supportedVersionsKey";
085    private static final String searchNodeName = "searchResults";
086    private boolean activeSearch = false;
087    private final int cellSize = 300; // in px
088    private Stack<Node> pageTrail; // top of stack is current page
089    private SymbolGVAdapter symbolTableAdapter;
090    private Button configureButton;
091    private ToggleButton flattenTreeToggle;
092    private Node selectedSymbolNode;
093    private MilStdIconRenderer mir = null;
094    private final Bitmap emptyBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(100, 100, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
095
096    // Main Modifiers Dialog
097    private Dialog mainModifiersDialog;
098    private RadioGroup contextRadioGroup;
099    private Spinner stdIdSpinner;
100    private Spinner statusSpinner;
101    private Spinner hqSpinner;
102    private Spinner ampCategorySpinner;
103    private Spinner ampTypeSpinner;
104    private LinearLayout ampTypeLayout;
105    private boolean hasSectorModifiers;
106    private Spinner sector1Spinner;
107    private final int SECTOR_1_MINE_INDEX = 13; // position of Mine in ss_ControlMeasure_sector1_array
108    private final int ANTIPERSONNEL_MINE = 0b000001;
109    private final int ANTIPERSONNEL_MINE_DIRECTIONAL = 0b000010;
110    private final int ANTITANK_MINE = 0b000100;
111    private final int ANTITANK_MINE_ANTIHANDLING = 0b001000;
112    private final int WIDE_AREA_ANTITANK_MINE = 0b010000;
113    private final int MINE_CLUSTER = 0b100000;
114    private SparseArray<String> mineSectorLookup;
115    private ArrayList<Integer> invalidMineTrios;
116    private CheckBox AntipersonnelMineBox;
117    private CheckBox AntipersonnelDirectionalMineBox;
118    private CheckBox AntitankMineBox;
119    private CheckBox AntitankAntihandlingMineBox;
120    private CheckBox WideAreaAntitankMineBox;
121    private CheckBox MineClusterBox;
122    private ArrayList<CheckBox> mineCheckBoxList;
123    private int numMinesChecked;
124    private Spinner sector2Spinner;
125    private boolean hasCountryModifier;
126    private TextView countryTextView;
127    private TreeMap<String, String> countryMap;
128    private ArrayList<String> countryNames;
129    private Dialog countrySearchDialog;
130
131    // Attributes + Extra Modifiers Dialog
132    private Dialog extraModifiersDialog;
133    private static final int M = 0;
134    private static final int KM = 1;
135    private static final int FT = 2;
136    private static final int SM = 3;
137    private static final int FL = 4;
138    enum AltitudeUnits {
139        M(SymbolPickerActivity.M, "(meters)"),
140        KM(SymbolPickerActivity.KM, "(kilometers)"),
141        FT(SymbolPickerActivity.FT, "(feet)"),
142        SM(SymbolPickerActivity.SM, "(statute miles)"),
143        FL(SymbolPickerActivity.FL, "(flight level)");
144
145        private final int index;
146        private final String desc;
147
148        AltitudeUnits(int index, String description) {
149            this.index = index;
150            this.desc = description;
151        }
152    }
153    enum AltitudeModes {
154        AMSL(0, "(above mean sea level)"),
155        BMSL(1, "(below mean sea level)"),
156        HAE(2, "(height above ellipsoid)"),
157        AGL(3, "(above ground level)");
158
159        private final int index;
160        private final String desc;
161
162        AltitudeModes(int index, String description) {
163            this.index = index;
164            this.desc = description;
165        }
166    }
167
168    Spinner altitudeUnitSpinner;
169    Spinner altitudeModeSpinner;
170    private ArrayList<String> modifiersToGet;
171    private HashMap<String, String> modifiersToSend;
172    private HashMap<String, String> attributesToSend;
173    private TreeManager treeManager;
174
175    @Override
176    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
177        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
178        setContentView(R.layout.activity_symbol_picker);
179
180        pageTrail = new Stack<>();
181
182        Button backButton = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_back_button);
183        backButton.setOnClickListener(view -> onBackPressed());
184
185        configureButton = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_configure_button);
186        configureButton.setOnClickListener(view -> onConfigureSymbol());
187
188        symbolTableAdapter = new SymbolGVAdapter(this, new ArrayList<>());
189        GridView symbolTable = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_table);
190        symbolTable.setAdapter(symbolTableAdapter);
191        symbolTable.setColumnWidth(cellSize);
192
193        flattenTreeToggle = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_flatten_toggle);
194        flattenTreeToggle.setOnClickListener(view -> updateSymbolTable());
195
196        // Do not reinitialize render or change settings in child activity
197        mir = MilStdIconRenderer.getInstance();
198
199        treeManager = new TreeManager();
200        try {
201            int[] versions = getIntent().getIntArrayExtra(supportedVersionsKey);
202            if (versions == null)
203                versions = new int[]{SymbolID.Version_2525Dch1};
204            treeManager.buildTree(getApplicationContext(), versions);
205        } catch (IOException e) {
206            throw new RuntimeException(e);
207        }
208
209        updateSelectedSymbol(treeManager.mil2525Tree);
210
211        // read in country names and codes
212        String line;
213        String[] segments;
214        countryMap = new TreeMap<>();
215        try (InputStream in = this.getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.genc);
216             BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in))) {
217            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
218                segments = line.split("\t+");
219                StringBuilder countryCode = new StringBuilder(segments[1]);
220                while (countryCode.length() < 3) {
221                    countryCode.insert(0, "0");
222                }
223                countryMap.put(segments[2], countryCode.toString());
224            }
225        } catch (IOException e) {
226            throw new RuntimeException(e);
227        }
228        countryNames = new ArrayList<>(countryMap.keySet());
229        Collections.sort(countryNames);
230
231        SearchView symbolSearchView = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_search);
232        symbolSearchView.setOnQueryTextListener(new SearchBoxListener());
233
234        // these four combinations of 3 mines do not have a code in 2525D Change 1
235        invalidMineTrios = new ArrayList<>();
236        invalidMineTrios.add(ANTITANK_MINE | ANTITANK_MINE_ANTIHANDLING | WIDE_AREA_ANTITANK_MINE);
237        invalidMineTrios.add(ANTITANK_MINE | ANTITANK_MINE_ANTIHANDLING | MINE_CLUSTER);
238        invalidMineTrios.add(ANTITANK_MINE | WIDE_AREA_ANTITANK_MINE | MINE_CLUSTER);
239        invalidMineTrios.add(ANTITANK_MINE_ANTIHANDLING | WIDE_AREA_ANTITANK_MINE | MINE_CLUSTER);
240    }
241
242    @Override
243    public void onBackPressed() {
244        if (pageTrail.peek().getName().equals(searchNodeName)) {
245            // Clearing the query will remove the search page
246            SearchView symbolSearchView = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_search);
247            symbolSearchView.setQuery("", false);
248            symbolSearchView.clearFocus();
249        } else if (pageTrail.size() > 1) {
250            // Go to next higher level
251            pageTrail.pop();
252            updateSelectedSymbol(pageTrail.pop());
253        } else {
254            // Ask if the user wishes to exit
255            new AlertDialog.Builder(this)
256                    .setTitle("Confirm Exit")
257                    .setMessage("Do you want to exit the symbol picker?")
258                    .setPositiveButton(android.R.string.cancel, null)
259                    .setNegativeButton(android.R.string.ok, (dialog, whichButton) -> {
260                        // Exit symbol picker return blank symbol code
261                        Intent resultIntent = new Intent();
262                        resultIntent.putExtra(selectedSymbolIdKey, "");
263                        setResult(Activity.RESULT_OK, resultIntent);
264                        finish();
265                    })
266                    .show();
267        }
268    }
269
270    // Updates symbol preview on modifier change
271    private class ModifierSpinnerListener implements AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener {
272        @Override
273        public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> adapterView, View view, int i, long l) {
274            updateSymbolPreview();
275
276            // Disables altitudeModeSpinner if user selects "FL" (flight level) because it doesn't use an altitude mode
277            // (though the selected Mode would be ignored anyway)
278            if (altitudeUnitSpinner != null && altitudeModeSpinner != null) {
279                altitudeModeSpinner.setEnabled(altitudeUnitSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition() != AltitudeUnits.valueOf("FL").index);
280            }
281        }
282
283        @Override
284        public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> adapterView) {
285            updateSymbolPreview();
286        }
287    }
288
289    // Called when "configure symbol" is clicked
290    private void onConfigureSymbol() {
291        // There's no good way to send a SparseArray<String> in an Intent, so use HashMaps here and
292        // the calling application can build SparseArrays from them.
293        modifiersToSend = new HashMap<>();
294        attributesToSend = new HashMap<>();
295
296        final int selectedSymbolVersion = Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolNode.getVersion());
297        final String selectedSymbolSet = selectedSymbolNode.getSymbolSetCode();
298        final String selectedSymbolEntityCode = selectedSymbolNode.getCode();
299        final String selectedSymbolName = selectedSymbolNode.getName();
300
301        // TODO temporarily bypasses weather all modifiers because the extra ones that are applicable are not implemented yet (and thus sends empty modifiers HashMap back up)
302        switch (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolSet)) {
303            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Atmospheric:
304            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Oceanographic:
305            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_MeteorologicalSpace:
306                // for debugging modifiers:
307                /*MSInfo msi = MSLookup.getInstance().getMSLInfo(symbolSetCode + selectedSymbolEntityCode,0);
308                ArrayList<Integer> initialModifiers = msi.getModifiers();
309                ArrayList<Integer> ignoreModifiers = Modifiers.GetPredeterminedModifiersList();
310                modifiersToGet = new ArrayList<>();
311                for (int i : initialModifiers) {
312                    if (!ignoreModifiers.contains(i)) {
313                        modifiersToGet.add(i);
314                        Log.d("onSelectPressed", "added modifier: " + i);
315                    }
316                }*/
317
318                // construct neutral present (---4--0) code for all weather symbols
319                String weatherSymbolID = selectedSymbolVersion + "04" + selectedSymbolSet + "0000" + selectedSymbolEntityCode + "00000000000000";
320                Intent resultIntent = new Intent();
321                resultIntent.putExtra(selectedSymbolIdKey, weatherSymbolID);
322                resultIntent.putExtra(modifiersKey, modifiersToSend);
323                resultIntent.putExtra(attributesKey, attributesToSend);
324                setResult(Activity.RESULT_OK, resultIntent);
325                finish();
326                return;
327        }
328
329        mainModifiersDialog = new Dialog(this);
330        mainModifiersDialog.requestWindowFeature(Window.FEATURE_NO_TITLE);
331        mainModifiersDialog.setContentView(R.layout.modifiers_page1);
332        mainModifiersDialog.getWindow().setLayout(WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT);
333        mainModifiersDialog.show();
334
335        contextRadioGroup = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.context_radio_group);
336        contextRadioGroup.setOnCheckedChangeListener((radioGroup, i) -> updateSymbolPreview());
337
338        stdIdSpinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.std_id_spinner);
339        ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> stdIdAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
340                R.array.std_id_array, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
341        stdIdAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
342        stdIdSpinner.setAdapter(stdIdAdapter);
343        stdIdSpinner.setSelection(3); // Default to friendly identity
344        stdIdSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
345
346        statusSpinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.status_spinner);
347        ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> statusAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
348                R.array.status_array, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
349        statusAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
350        statusSpinner.setAdapter(statusAdapter);
351        statusSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
352
353        hqSpinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.hq_spinner);
354        ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> hqAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
355                R.array.hq_array, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
356        hqAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
357        hqSpinner.setAdapter(hqAdapter);
358        hqSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
359
360        ampCategorySpinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.amplifier_category_spinner);
361        ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> ampCategoryAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
362                R.array.amplifier_category_array, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
363        ampCategoryAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
364        ampCategorySpinner.setAdapter(ampCategoryAdapter);
365        ampCategorySpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new AmplifierSelectedItemListener());
366
367        ampTypeLayout = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.amplifier_type_layout);
368        ampTypeLayout.setVisibility(View.GONE);
369
370        ampTypeSpinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.amplifier_type_spinner);
371        ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> ampTypeAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
372                R.array.amp0_unknown_array, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
373        ampTypeAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
374        ampTypeSpinner.setAdapter(ampTypeAdapter);
375        ampTypeSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
376
377        int sector1ArrayID;
378        int sector2ArrayID;
379
380        switch (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolSet)) {
381            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Air:
382                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_Air_sector1_array;
383                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_Air_sector2_array;
384                break;
385            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_AirMissile:
386                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_AirMissile_sector1_array;
387                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_AirMissile_sector2_array;
388                break;
389            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Space:
390                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_Space_sector1_array;
391                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_Space_sector2_array;
392                break;
393            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SpaceMissile:
394                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_SpaceMissile_sector1_array;
395                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_SpaceMissile_sector2_array;
396                break;
397            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_LandUnit:
398                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandUnit_sector1_array;
399                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandUnit_sector2_array;
400                break;
401            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_LandCivilianUnit_Organization:
402                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandCivilianUnitOrganization_sector1_array;
403                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandCivilianUnitOrganization_sector2_array;
404                break;
405            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_LandEquipment:
406                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandEquipment_sector1_array;
407                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandEquipment_sector2_array;
408                break;
409            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_LandInstallation:
410                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandInstallation_sector1_array;
411                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_LandInstallation_sector2_array;
412                break;
413            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_ControlMeasure:
414                // Control Measures only use Sector 1
415                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_ControlMeasure_sector1_array;
416                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_NotApplicable_array;
417                break;
418            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SeaSurface:
419                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_SeaSurface_sector1_array;
420                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_SeaSurface_sector2_array;
421                break;
422            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SeaSubsurface:
423                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_SeaSubsurface_sector1_array;
424                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_SeaSubsurface_sector2_array;
425                break;
426            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Activities:
427                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_Activities_sector1_array;
428                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_Activities_sector2_array;
429                break;
430            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SignalsIntelligence_Space:
431            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SignalsIntelligence_Air:
432            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SignalsIntelligence_Land:
433            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SignalsIntelligence_SeaSurface:
434            case SymbolID.SymbolSet_SignalsIntelligence_SeaSubsurface:
435                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_SignalsIntelligence_sector1_array;
436                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_SignalsIntelligence_sector2_array;
437                break;
438            default:
439                // Unknown, MineWarfare, Cyberspace
440                // (also Atmospheric, Oceanographic, and MeteorologicalSpace if we don't skip their modifier dialogs)
441                sector1ArrayID = R.array.ss_NotApplicable_array;
442                sector2ArrayID = R.array.ss_NotApplicable_array;
443                break;
444        }
445
446        View sectorsView = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.sectors_layout);
447        if (sector1ArrayID == R.array.ss_NotApplicable_array) {
448            sectorsView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
449            hasSectorModifiers = false;
450        } else {
451            sectorsView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
452            hasSectorModifiers = true;
453
454            sector1Spinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.sector_1_spinner);
455            ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> sector1Adapter;
456            String[] landUnitSector1Mods = getResources().getStringArray(R.array.ss_LandUnit_sector1_array);
457            if (sector1ArrayID == R.array.ss_LandUnit_sector1_array) {
458                // create custom adapter to skip two "{Reserved for future use}" codes without altering the positions of the rest
459                sector1Adapter = new ArrayAdapter<CharSequence>(this, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item, landUnitSector1Mods) {
460                    @Override
461                    public View getDropDownView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent) {
462                        View v;
463
464                        if ("{Reserved for future use}".equals(landUnitSector1Mods[position])) {
465                            TextView tv = new TextView(getContext());
466                            tv.setHeight(0);
467                            tv.setVisibility(View.GONE);
468                            v = tv;
469                        } else {
470                            // Pass convertView as null to prevent reuse of special case views
471                            v = super.getDropDownView(position, null, parent);
472                        }
473                        return v;
474                    }
475                };
476            } else {
477                sector1Adapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
478                        sector1ArrayID, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
479            }
480
481            sector1Adapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
482            sector1Spinner.setAdapter(sector1Adapter);
483            sector1Spinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
484
485            sector2Spinner = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.sector_2_spinner);
486            ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> sector2Adapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(this,
487                    sector2ArrayID, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
488            sector2Adapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
489            sector2Spinner.setAdapter(sector2Adapter);
490            sector2Spinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
491        }
492
493        boolean isControlMeasure = (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolSet) == SymbolID.SymbolSet_ControlMeasure);
494        if (isControlMeasure) {
495            // set up Mines checkboxes for Control Measures
496            View mineContainer = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.mine_type_layout);
497            sector1Spinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener() {
498                @Override
499                public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id) {
500                    if (position == SECTOR_1_MINE_INDEX) {
501                        mineContainer.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
502                    } else {
503                        mineContainer.setVisibility(View.GONE);
504                    }
505                    updateSymbolPreview(); // necessary since this ItemSelectedListener overwrites the previously set ModifierSpinnerListener
506                }
507
508                @Override
509                public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> parent) {
510                    // Auto-generated method stub
511                }
512            });
513
514            String line;
515            String[] segments;
516            mineSectorLookup = new SparseArray<>(51); // needs space for indices up to 50
517            try (InputStream in = this.getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.mine_bitmasks_to_codes);
518                 BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in))) {
519                while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
520                    segments = line.split("\t+");
521                    // converts segments[0] binary string to int index, and reads segments[1] as string for symbol code
522                    mineSectorLookup.put(Integer.parseInt(segments[0], 2), segments[1]);
523                }
524            } catch (IOException e) {
525                throw new RuntimeException(e);
526            }
527
528            AntipersonnelMineBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.antipersonnel_mine_checkbox);
529            AntipersonnelDirectionalMineBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.antipersonnel_mine_directional_checkbox);
530            AntitankMineBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.antitank_mine_checkbox);
531            AntitankAntihandlingMineBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.antitank_mine_antihandling_checkbox);
532            WideAreaAntitankMineBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.wide_area_antitank_mine_checkbox);
533            MineClusterBox = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.mine_cluster_checkbox);
534
535            mineCheckBoxList = new ArrayList<>();
536            mineCheckBoxList.add(AntipersonnelMineBox);
537            mineCheckBoxList.add(AntipersonnelDirectionalMineBox);
538            mineCheckBoxList.add(AntitankMineBox);
539            mineCheckBoxList.add(AntitankAntihandlingMineBox);
540            mineCheckBoxList.add(WideAreaAntitankMineBox);
541            mineCheckBoxList.add(MineClusterBox);
542
543            CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener mineSelectionLimiter = (cb, isChecked) -> {
544                if (isChecked) {
545                    numMinesChecked++;
546                    if (numMinesChecked == 3) {
547                        for (CheckBox mine : mineCheckBoxList) {
548                            if (!mine.isChecked()) {
549                                mine.setEnabled(false);
550                            }
551                        }
552                    }
553                } else {
554                    numMinesChecked--;
555                    for (CheckBox mine : mineCheckBoxList) {
556                        mine.setEnabled(true);
557                    }
558                }
559                updateSymbolPreview();
560            };
561
562            for (CheckBox mine : mineCheckBoxList) {
563                mine.setOnCheckedChangeListener(mineSelectionLimiter);
564            }
565        }
566
567        View countryView = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.country_layout);
568        MSInfo msi = MSLookup.getInstance().getMSLInfo(selectedSymbolSet + selectedSymbolEntityCode, selectedSymbolVersion);
569        if (!msi.getModifiers().contains(Modifiers.AS_COUNTRY)) {
570            countryView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
571            hasCountryModifier = false;
572        } else {
573            countryView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
574            hasCountryModifier = true;
575            countryTextView = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.country_textview);
576            countryTextView.setBackgroundColor(Color.TRANSPARENT);
577
578            countryTextView.setOnClickListener(v -> {
579                countrySearchDialog = new Dialog(this);
580                countrySearchDialog.setContentView(R.layout.country_selector);
581                countrySearchDialog.getWindow().setLayout(WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT);
582                countrySearchDialog.show();
583
584                EditText editText = countrySearchDialog.findViewById(R.id.country_edittext);
585                editText.setBackgroundColor(Color.TRANSPARENT);
586                ListView listView = countrySearchDialog.findViewById(R.id.country_listview);
587
588                ArrayAdapter<String> adapter = new ArrayAdapter<>(this, android.R.layout.simple_list_item_1, countryNames);
589                listView.setAdapter(adapter);
590                editText.addTextChangedListener(new TextWatcher() {
591                    @Override
592                    public void beforeTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int count, int after) {
593                        // Auto-generated method stub
594                    }
595
596                    @Override
597                    public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int before, int count) {
598                        adapter.getFilter().filter(s);
599                    }
600
601                    @Override
602                    public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
603                        // Auto-generated method stub
604                    }
605                });
606
607                listView.setOnItemClickListener((parent, view, position, id) -> {
608                    countryTextView.setText(adapter.getItem(position));
609                    countrySearchDialog.dismiss();
610                    updateSymbolPreview();
611                });
612            });
613        }
614
615        Button modifiersBackButton = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.modifiers_page1_back_button);
616        modifiersBackButton.setOnClickListener(w -> mainModifiersDialog.dismiss());
617
618        ViewGroup symbolPreviewView = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_modifiers_preview);
619        TextView symbolPreviewTV = symbolPreviewView.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_cell_TV);
620        symbolPreviewTV.setText(selectedSymbolName);
621        TextViewCompat.setAutoSizeTextTypeUniformWithConfiguration(symbolPreviewTV, 8,
622                12, 1, TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_SP);
623        ViewGroup.LayoutParams params = symbolPreviewView.getLayoutParams();
624        params.height = cellSize;
625        params.width = cellSize;
626        symbolPreviewView.setLayoutParams(params);
627
628        Button sendButton = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.send_button);
629        sendButton.setOnClickListener(view -> onPickSymbol());
630        sendButton.setText(getString(R.string.send_btn_label, "'" + selectedSymbolName + "'"));
631
632        // build list of modifiers that aren't already determined by the symbol code
633        ArrayList<String> initialModifiers = msi.getModifiers();
634        ArrayList<String> ignoreModifiers = Modifiers.GetSymbolCodeModifiersList();
635        modifiersToGet = new ArrayList<>();
636        for (String i : initialModifiers) {
637            if (!ignoreModifiers.contains(i)) {
638                modifiersToGet.add(i);
639            }
640        }
641
642        Button extraModifiersButton = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.extra_modifiers_button);
643        if (!modifiersToGet.isEmpty() || isControlMeasure) {
644            extraModifiersButton.setEnabled(true);
645            extraModifiersButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
646                extraModifiersDialog = new Dialog(this);
647                extraModifiersDialog.requestWindowFeature(Window.FEATURE_NO_TITLE);
648                extraModifiersDialog.setContentView(R.layout.modifiers_page2);
649                extraModifiersDialog.getWindow().setLayout(WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT);
650                extraModifiersDialog.show();
651
652                altitudeUnitSpinner = null;
653                altitudeModeSpinner = null;
654
655                // Attributes
656                LinearLayout attributesLayout = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.attributes_layout);
657                CheckBox outlineCheckbox = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.outline_checkbox);
658                // show outline checkbox just for single-point Control Measures
659                String tempCode = selectedSymbolVersion + "03" + selectedSymbolSet + "0000" + selectedSymbolEntityCode + "0000";
660                if (isControlMeasure && SymbolUtilities.isMultiPoint(tempCode) == false) {
661                    outlineCheckbox.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
662                }
663
664                EditText lineColorField = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.edit_LineColor);
665                EditText fillColorField = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.edit_FillColor);
666                EditText lineWidthField = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.edit_LineWidth);
667                EditText textColorField = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.edit_TextColor);
668                if (isControlMeasure) {
669                    attributesLayout.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
670                    // restores previous values if dialog was reopened
671                    outlineCheckbox.setChecked(Boolean.parseBoolean(attributesToSend.get(MilStdAttributes.OutlineSymbol)));
672                    lineColorField.setText(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.LineColor, ""));
673                    fillColorField.setText(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.FillColor, ""));
674                    lineWidthField.setText(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.LineWidth, ""));
675                    textColorField.setText(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.TextColor, ""));
676                }
677
678                // Extra modifiers
679                LinearLayout ll = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.modifiers_layout);
680                LinearLayout unitLayout = null;
681
682                for (String i : modifiersToGet) {
683                    EditText et = new EditText(this);
684                    LinearLayout.LayoutParams p = new LinearLayout.LayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);
685                    et.setLayoutParams(p);
686
687                    // set maximum char length for the field?
688                    /*
689                    et.setFilters(new InputFilter[] { new InputFilter.LengthFilter(3) });
690                    //Disabling suggestions seems to be the only way to stop the buffer from
691                    //filling past the length limit if you keep typing.
692                    et.setInputType(InputType.TYPE_TEXT_FLAG_NO_SUGGESTIONS);
693                    */
694
695                    et.setHint(Modifiers.getModifierLetterCode(i) + ": " + Modifiers.getModifierName(i));
696                    //et.setId(i);
697                    et.setId(convertStringIDtoInt(i));
698                    et.setText(modifiersToSend.getOrDefault(i, "")); // restores previous values if dialog was reopened
699
700                    // DateTime fields
701                    if (i == Modifiers.W_DTG_1 || i == Modifiers.W1_DTG_2) {
702                        et.setInputType(InputType.TYPE_NULL); // prevents users from typing directly in datetime field
703                        // ensures the EditText only has to be clicked once to show dialog
704                        et.setOnFocusChangeListener((d, hasFocus) -> {
705                            if (hasFocus)
706                                callDatetimeDialog(et);
707                        });
708                        et.setOnClickListener(l -> callDatetimeDialog(et));
709                    }
710
711                    // Dynamically add spinners for multi-point graphics' X (altitude/depth) Units and Mode.
712                    // (For single-point graphics, the X field is free-type.)
713                    if (i == Modifiers.X_ALTITUDE_DEPTH) {
714                        if (isControlMeasure) {
715                            LinearLayout.LayoutParams altParams = new LinearLayout.LayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);
716
717                            // build unit array, label, and spinner
718                            List<String> unitArray = new ArrayList<>();
719                            for (AltitudeUnits u : AltitudeUnits.values()) {
720                                unitArray.add(u.name() + " " + u.desc);
721                            }
722
723                            unitLayout = new LinearLayout(this);
724                            unitLayout.setLayoutParams(altParams);
725                            TextView unitLabel = new TextView(this);
726                            unitLabel.setText(R.string.altitude_unit_label);
727
728                            altitudeUnitSpinner = new Spinner(this);
729                            ArrayAdapter<String> unitAdapter = new ArrayAdapter<String>(this, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item, unitArray) {
730                                @Override
731                                public View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent) {
732                                    View v = super.getView(position, convertView, parent);
733                                    v.setMinimumHeight((int) (48*this.getContext().getResources().getDisplayMetrics().density));
734                                    return v;
735                                }
736                            };
737                            unitAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
738                            altitudeUnitSpinner.setAdapter(unitAdapter);
739                            altitudeUnitSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
740
741                            unitLayout.addView(unitLabel);
742                            unitLayout.addView(altitudeUnitSpinner);
743
744                            // build mode array, label, and spinner
745                            List<String> modeArray = new ArrayList<>();
746                            for (AltitudeModes m : AltitudeModes.values()) {
747                                modeArray.add(m.name() + " " + m.desc);
748                            }
749
750                            LinearLayout modeLayout = new LinearLayout(this);
751                            modeLayout.setLayoutParams(altParams);
752                            TextView modeLabel = new TextView(this);
753                            modeLabel.setText(R.string.altitude_mode_label);
754
755                            altitudeModeSpinner = new Spinner(this);
756                            ArrayAdapter<String> modeAdapter = new ArrayAdapter<String>(this, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item, modeArray) {
757                                @Override
758                                public View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent) {
759                                    View v = super.getView(position, convertView, parent);
760                                    v.setMinimumHeight((int) (48*this.getContext().getResources().getDisplayMetrics().density));
761                                    return v;
762                                }
763                            };
764                            modeAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
765                            altitudeModeSpinner.setAdapter(modeAdapter);
766                            altitudeModeSpinner.setOnItemSelectedListener(new ModifierSpinnerListener());
767
768                            modeLayout.addView(modeLabel);
769                            modeLayout.addView(altitudeModeSpinner);
770
771                            // change multi-point X hint and add X, Units, and Mode fields to the main view
772                            et.setHint(Modifiers.getModifierLetterCode(i) + ": " + Modifiers.getModifierName(i) + "\n(Type one or more comma-separated numbers)");
773                            ll.addView(et);
774                            ll.addView(unitLayout);
775                            ll.addView(modeLayout);
776
777                            // if the calling application passes any invalid values for altitude units or mode, this sets both to the defaults
778                            try {
779                                altitudeUnitSpinner.setSelection(AltitudeUnits.valueOf(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.AltitudeUnits, "1,M").split(",")[1]).index);
780                                altitudeModeSpinner.setSelection(AltitudeModes.valueOf(attributesToSend.getOrDefault(MilStdAttributes.AltitudeMode, "AMSL")).index);
781                            } catch (Exception e) {
782                                altitudeUnitSpinner.setSelection(AltitudeUnits.valueOf("M").index);
783                                altitudeModeSpinner.setSelection(AltitudeModes.valueOf("AMSL").index);
784                            }
785                            continue;
786                        } else {
787                            // change single-point X hint
788                            et.setHint(Modifiers.getModifierLetterCode(i) + ": " + Modifiers.getModifierName(i) + "\n(Type anything, e.g. 500 M AMSL)");
789                        }
790                    }
791                    ll.addView(et);
792                }
793
794                Button saveExtraModsButton = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.modifiers_dialog_save_button);
795                saveExtraModsButton.setOnClickListener(w -> {
796                    // save attributes
797                    if (isControlMeasure) {
798                        attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.OutlineSymbol, String.valueOf(outlineCheckbox.isChecked()));
799
800                        String value = String.valueOf(lineColorField.getText());
801                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
802                            attributesToSend.remove(MilStdAttributes.LineColor);
803                        } else {
804                            attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.LineColor, value);
805                        }
806
807                        value = String.valueOf(fillColorField.getText());
808                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
809                            attributesToSend.remove(MilStdAttributes.FillColor);
810                        } else {
811                            attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.FillColor, value);
812                        }
813
814                        value = String.valueOf(lineWidthField.getText());
815                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
816                            attributesToSend.remove(MilStdAttributes.LineWidth);
817                        } else {
818                            attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.LineWidth, value);
819                        }
820
821                        value = String.valueOf(textColorField.getText());
822                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
823                            attributesToSend.remove(MilStdAttributes.TextColor);
824                        } else {
825                            attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.TextColor, value);
826                        }
827                    }
828
829                    if (altitudeUnitSpinner != null && altitudeUnitSpinner.getVisibility() == View.VISIBLE) {
830                        // We are assuming the user will not do any unit conversion--they will always type a value in (e.g.) meters if they want to display meters.
831                        // Therefore the AltitudeUnits string should always be "1,<x>" where <x> is one of M/KM/FT/SM/FL because the conversion factor will always be 1.
832                        attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.AltitudeUnits, "1," + ((String) altitudeUnitSpinner.getSelectedItem()).split(" ")[0]);
833                        attributesToSend.put(MilStdAttributes.AltitudeMode, ((String) altitudeModeSpinner.getSelectedItem()).split(" ")[0]);
834                    }
835
836                    // save extra modifiers
837                    for (String j : modifiersToGet) {
838                        EditText et = extraModifiersDialog.findViewById(convertStringIDtoInt(j));
839                        String value = String.valueOf(et.getText());
840                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
841                            modifiersToSend.remove(j);
842                        } else {
843                            modifiersToSend.put(j, value);
844                        }
845                    }
846                    extraModifiersDialog.dismiss();
847                    updateSymbolPreview();
848                });
849            });
850            updateSymbolPreview();
851        } else {
852            extraModifiersButton.setEnabled(false);
853        }
854    }
855
856    /**
857     * Used to call Datetime selector from Extra Modifiers page (should only be called from that page)
858     * @param et Datetime EditText field that called this dialog
859     */
860    private void callDatetimeDialog(EditText et) {
861        Dialog datetimeDialog = new Dialog(this);
862        datetimeDialog.setContentView(R.layout.datetime_selector);
863        datetimeDialog.getWindow().setLayout(WindowManager.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, WindowManager.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);
864        datetimeDialog.show();
865
866        DatePicker datePicker = datetimeDialog.findViewById(R.id.datePicker);
867        TimePicker timePicker = datetimeDialog.findViewById(R.id.timePicker);
868        timePicker.setIs24HourView(true);
869
870        Button nowButton = datetimeDialog.findViewById(R.id.datetime_now_button);
871        nowButton.setOnClickListener(n -> {
872            Calendar c = Calendar.getInstance();
873            int year = c.get(Calendar.YEAR);
874            int month = c.get(Calendar.MONTH);
875            int day = c.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
876            datePicker.init(year, month, day, null);
877            timePicker.setHour(c.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY));
878            timePicker.setMinute(c.get(Calendar.MINUTE));
879        });
880        nowButton.callOnClick();
881
882        Button onOrderButton = datetimeDialog.findViewById(R.id.datetime_on_order_button);
883        onOrderButton.setOnClickListener(o -> {
884            et.setText("O/O");
885            datetimeDialog.dismiss();
886            updateSymbolPreview();
887        });
888
889        Button confirmTimeButton = datetimeDialog.findViewById(R.id.datetime_confirm_button);
890        confirmTimeButton.setOnClickListener(c -> {
891            Calendar myCalendar = new GregorianCalendar(datePicker.getYear(), datePicker.getMonth(), datePicker.getDayOfMonth(), timePicker.getHour(), timePicker.getMinute());
892            Date selectedDate = myCalendar.getTime();
893            et.setText(SymbolUtilities.getDateLabel(selectedDate));
894            datetimeDialog.dismiss();
895            updateSymbolPreview();
896        });
897    }
898
899    private int getMineBitmask() {
900        int mineBitmask = 0;
901
902        if (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolNode.getSymbolSetCode()) == SymbolID.SymbolSet_ControlMeasure) {
903            if (AntipersonnelMineBox.isChecked())
904                mineBitmask |= ANTIPERSONNEL_MINE;
905            if (AntipersonnelDirectionalMineBox.isChecked())
906                mineBitmask |= ANTIPERSONNEL_MINE_DIRECTIONAL;
907            if (AntitankMineBox.isChecked())
908                mineBitmask |= ANTITANK_MINE;
909            if (AntitankAntihandlingMineBox.isChecked())
910                mineBitmask |= ANTITANK_MINE_ANTIHANDLING;
911            if (WideAreaAntitankMineBox.isChecked())
912                mineBitmask |= WIDE_AREA_ANTITANK_MINE;
913            if (MineClusterBox.isChecked())
914                mineBitmask |= MINE_CLUSTER;
915        }
916        return mineBitmask;
917    }
918
919    // Updates preview in configure symbol page
920    // Uses modifiers - different than update selected symbol
921    private void updateSymbolPreview() {
922        // update Control Measures modifier N ("ENY" if hostile)
923        boolean isHostile = (SymbolID.getAffiliation(getSymbolID()) == SymbolID.StandardIdentity_Affiliation_Hostile_Faker);
924        modifiersToSend.put(Modifiers.N_HOSTILE, isHostile ? "ENY" : null);
925
926        Map<String,String> modifiers = new HashMap<>();
927        for (String i : modifiersToSend.keySet()) {
928            modifiers.put(i, modifiersToSend.get(i));
929        }
930        Map<String,String> attributes = new HashMap<>();
931        for (String i : attributesToSend.keySet()) {
932            attributes.put(i, attributesToSend.get(i));
933        }
934        attributes.put(MilStdAttributes.PixelSize, "240");
935
936        ImageInfo ii = mir.RenderIcon(getSymbolID(), modifiers, attributes);
937
938        ViewGroup symbolPreviewView = mainModifiersDialog.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_modifiers_preview);
939        ImageView symbolPreviewIV = symbolPreviewView.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_cell_IV);
940        symbolPreviewIV.setBackgroundColor(Color.LTGRAY);
941
942        if (ii != null && ii.getImage() != null)
943            symbolPreviewIV.setImageBitmap(ii.getImage());
944        else
945            // If can't render show empty preview
946            symbolPreviewIV.setImageBitmap(emptyBitmap);
947    }
948
949    // Returns symbol id with no modifiers just symbol set and entity code in correct positions
950    private String getGenericSymbolID(Node symbolNode) {
951        return symbolNode.getVersion() + "03" + symbolNode.getSymbolSetCode() + "0011" + symbolNode.getCode() + "00000000000000";
952    }
953
954    // Includes modifiers in code
955    private String getSymbolID() {
956        final String selectedSymbolSet = selectedSymbolNode.getSymbolSetCode();
957        final String selectedSymbolEntityCode = selectedSymbolNode.getCode();
958
959        // Resource IDs will be non-final by default in Android Gradle Plugin version 8.0,
960        // so Google recommends using if/else for them instead of switch statements.
961        int checkedRadioButtonId = contextRadioGroup.getCheckedRadioButtonId();
962        String contextCode;
963        if (checkedRadioButtonId == R.id.context_radio_exercise) {
964            contextCode = String.valueOf(SymbolID.StandardIdentity_Context_Exercise);
965        } else if (checkedRadioButtonId == R.id.context_radio_simulation) {
966            contextCode = String.valueOf(SymbolID.StandardIdentity_Context_Simulation);
967        } else {
968            contextCode = String.valueOf(SymbolID.StandardIdentity_Context_Reality);
969        }
970
971        // For spinners, the selected item position equals the digit to use in the symbol code
972        // (except for ampTypeSpinner, which is position+1 when not category Unknown).
973        String stdIdCode = String.valueOf(stdIdSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition());
974        String statusCode = String.valueOf(statusSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition());
975        String hqCode = String.valueOf(hqSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition());
976
977        String amplifierCode = "00";
978        if (ampCategorySpinner.getSelectedItemPosition() != 0) {
979            amplifierCode = ampCategorySpinner.getSelectedItemPosition() +
980                    String.valueOf(ampTypeSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition() + 1);
981        }
982
983        String sector1Code = "00";
984        String sector2Code = "00";
985        if (hasSectorModifiers) {
986            DecimalFormat twoDigitFormatter = new DecimalFormat("00");
987            sector1Code = twoDigitFormatter.format(sector1Spinner.getSelectedItemPosition());
988            sector2Code = twoDigitFormatter.format(sector2Spinner.getSelectedItemPosition());
989
990            // (Control Measures) Gets symbol code section matching mineBitmask, or returns value for "Unspecified Mine" if combination is not found.
991            if (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolSet) == SymbolID.SymbolSet_ControlMeasure && Integer.parseInt(sector1Code) == SECTOR_1_MINE_INDEX) {
992                sector1Code = mineSectorLookup.get(getMineBitmask(), String.valueOf(SECTOR_1_MINE_INDEX));
993            }
994        }
995
996        String countryCode = "000";
997        if (hasCountryModifier) {
998            String key = (String) countryTextView.getText();
999            if (!Objects.equals(key, "")) {
1000                countryCode = countryMap.get(key);
1001            }
1002        }
1003
1004        return selectedSymbolNode.getVersion() + contextCode + stdIdCode + selectedSymbolSet + statusCode + hqCode + amplifierCode +
1005                selectedSymbolEntityCode + sector1Code + sector2Code + "0000000" + countryCode;
1006    }
1007
1008    // Called when pick button is selected from the configure window
1009    private void onPickSymbol() {
1010        String canRender;
1011        int mineBitmask = getMineBitmask();
1012        final String symbolID = getSymbolID();
1013        if (SymbolUtilities.isMultiPoint(symbolID)) {
1014            Map<String,String> modifiers = new HashMap<>();
1015            for (String i : modifiersToSend.keySet()) {
1016                modifiers.put(i, modifiersToSend.get(i));
1017            }
1018            canRender = MultiPointHandler.canRenderMultiPoint(symbolID, modifiers, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
1019            if (!canRender.equals("true")) {
1020                // Clean up error message for user
1021                canRender = selectedSymbolNode.getName() + canRender.substring(30);
1022                canRender = canRender.replace("a modifiers object that has ", "");
1023            }
1024        } else {
1025            Map<String,String> attributes = new HashMap<>();
1026            for (String i : attributesToSend.keySet()) {
1027                attributes.put(i, attributesToSend.get(i));
1028            }
1029            if (MilStdIconRenderer.getInstance().CanRender(symbolID, attributes)) {
1030                canRender = "true";
1031            } else {
1032                // Shouldn't be able to get here with a single point that can't be rendered
1033                canRender = "Unable to render " + selectedSymbolNode.getName();
1034            }
1035        }
1036
1037        if (invalidMineTrios.contains(mineBitmask)) {
1038            Toast.makeText(mainModifiersDialog.getContext(), "Invalid combination of mines. Please make a different selection.", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
1039        } else if (canRender.equals("true")) {
1040            mainModifiersDialog.dismiss();
1041            Intent resultIntent = new Intent();
1042            resultIntent.putExtra(selectedSymbolIdKey, getSymbolID());
1043            resultIntent.putExtra(modifiersKey, modifiersToSend);
1044            resultIntent.putExtra(attributesKey, attributesToSend);
1045            setResult(Activity.RESULT_OK, resultIntent);
1046            finish();
1047        } else {
1048            Toast.makeText(mainModifiersDialog.getContext(), canRender, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
1049        }
1050    }
1051
1052    // Updates selected symbol variable, selected symbol preview and symbols on page if necessary
1053    private void updateSelectedSymbol(Node newSelectedSymbol) {
1054        // Update the selected symbol set code
1055        selectedSymbolNode = newSelectedSymbol;
1056        ImageView selectedSymbolIV = findViewById(R.id.selected_symbol_iv);
1057        Bitmap render = getRender(selectedSymbolNode);
1058
1059        String selectedSymbolName;
1060        if (selectedSymbolNode.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("root")) {
1061            selectedSymbolName = "Symbol";
1062        } else {
1063            selectedSymbolName = selectedSymbolNode.getName();
1064        }
1065        configureButton.setText(getString(R.string.configure_btn_label, "'" + selectedSymbolName + "'"));
1066
1067        if (render != null) {
1068            selectedSymbolIV.setImageBitmap(render);
1069            configureButton.setEnabled(canRender(getGenericSymbolID(selectedSymbolNode)));
1070
1071            // change button text for weather symbols because the modifier dialogs are skipped
1072            switch (Integer.parseInt(selectedSymbolNode.getSymbolSetCode())) {
1073                case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Atmospheric:
1074                case SymbolID.SymbolSet_Oceanographic:
1075                case SymbolID.SymbolSet_MeteorologicalSpace:
1076                    configureButton.setText(getString(R.string.send_btn_label, "'" + selectedSymbolName + "'"));
1077            }
1078        } else {
1079            selectedSymbolIV.setImageResource(R.drawable.baseline_folder_24);
1080            configureButton.setEnabled(false);
1081        }
1082
1083        if (!newSelectedSymbol.getChildren().isEmpty()) {
1084            pageTrail.add(selectedSymbolNode);
1085            updateSymbolTable();
1086        }
1087    }
1088
1089    // Updates symbols in page based on top of pageTrail
1090    private void updateSymbolTable() {
1091        Node symbolTree = pageTrail.peek();
1092        ArrayList<Node> symbols; // Symbols to be in new page
1093
1094        // Scroll to top
1095        GridView symbolTable = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_table);
1096        symbolTable.smoothScrollToPositionFromTop(0, 0, 0);
1097
1098        if (!flattenTreeToggle.isChecked()) {
1099            symbols = new ArrayList<>(symbolTree.getChildren());
1100        } else {
1101            symbols = new ArrayList<>(symbolTree.flatten());
1102        }
1103
1104        TextView symbolPath = findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_path);
1105
1106        StringBuilder pathStr = new StringBuilder();
1107        if (pageTrail.size() == 1) {
1108            pathStr.append("Home");
1109        } else if (activeSearch) {
1110            int searchNodeIndex = 1;
1111            while (!pageTrail.get(searchNodeIndex).getName().equals(searchNodeName)) {
1112                searchNodeIndex++;
1113            }
1114
1115            pathStr.append("Search");
1116            for (int i = searchNodeIndex + 1; i < pageTrail.size(); i++)
1117                pathStr.append(" > ").append(pageTrail.get(i).getName());
1118        } else {
1119            pathStr.append(pageTrail.get(1).getName());
1120            for (int i = 2; i < pageTrail.size(); i++)
1121                pathStr.append(" > ").append(pageTrail.get(i).getName());
1122        }
1123        symbolPath.setText(pathStr);
1124
1125        // (optional) sort symbols by name
1126        symbols.sort(Comparator.comparing(Node::getName));
1127
1128        symbolTableAdapter.clear();
1129        symbolTableAdapter.addAll(symbols);
1130    }
1131
1132    // returns null if can't render or other error
1133    // Does not include modifiers
1134    private Bitmap getRender(Node symbolNode) {
1135        final String version = symbolNode.getVersion();
1136        final String symbolSetCode = symbolNode.getSymbolSetCode();
1137        final String entityCode = symbolNode.getCode();
1138        String symbolID = getGenericSymbolID(symbolNode);
1139
1140        if (version.equals("XX") || entityCode.equals("XXXXXX") || entityCode.equals("XX"))
1141            // Error in code
1142            return null;
1143        else if (entityCode.equals("000000") &&
1144                (symbolSetCode.equals(SymbolID.SymbolSet_Atmospheric + "") ||
1145                        symbolSetCode.equals(SymbolID.SymbolSet_ControlMeasure + "") ||
1146                        symbolSetCode.equals(SymbolID.SymbolSet_MineWarfare + "") ||
1147                        symbolSetCode.equals(SymbolID.SymbolSet_Oceanographic + "")))
1148            // Top level symbol set that can't be rendered
1149            return null;
1150        else if (!entityCode.equals("000000") && !canRender(symbolID))
1151            // Check if can render icon. canRender() says it can't render "000000" but RenderIcon() will
1152            // return an empty frame for the symbol sets not excluded above
1153            return null;
1154
1155        Map<String,String> modifiers = new HashMap<>();
1156        Map<String,String> attributes = new HashMap<>();
1157
1158        attributes.put(MilStdAttributes.PixelSize, "50");
1159        attributes.put(MilStdAttributes.DrawAsIcon, "true"); // Make all symbols same size
1160
1161        ImageInfo ii = mir.RenderIcon(symbolID, modifiers, attributes);
1162        if (ii != null)
1163            return ii.getImage();
1164        else
1165            return null;
1166    }
1167
1168    // Same functionality and MilStdIconRenderer.CanRender() - doesn't log if can't render
1169    // Symbol picker calls canRender() with symbols it doesn't expect to be valid
1170    private Boolean canRender(String symbolID) {
1171        int version = SymbolID.getVersion(symbolID);
1172        String lookupID = SymbolUtilities.getBasicSymbolID(symbolID);
1173        String lookupSVGID = SVGLookup.getMainIconID(symbolID);
1174        MSInfo msi = MSLookup.getInstance().getMSLInfo(lookupID,SymbolID.getVersion(symbolID));
1175        SVGInfo si = SVGLookup.getInstance().getSVGLInfo(lookupSVGID, version);
1176
1177        // msi should never be null
1178        return msi != null && msi.getDrawRule() != DrawRules.DONOTDRAW && si != null;
1179    }
1180
1181    private class AmplifierSelectedItemListener implements AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener {
1182        @Override
1183        // specifically used for the Amplifier Category spinner to show/hide and change the subtype spinner
1184        public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> adapterView, View view, int i, long l) {
1185            int arrayId;
1186            switch (ampCategorySpinner.getSelectedItemPosition()) {
1187                case 1:
1188                    arrayId = R.array.amp1_echelon_bb_array;
1189                    break;
1190                case 2:
1191                    arrayId = R.array.amp2_echelon_da_array;
1192                    break;
1193                case 3:
1194                    arrayId = R.array.amp3_eqp_land_array;
1195                    break;
1196                case 4:
1197                    arrayId = R.array.amp4_eqp_snow_array;
1198                    break;
1199                case 5:
1200                    arrayId = R.array.amp5_eqp_water_array;
1201                    break;
1202                case 6:
1203                    arrayId = R.array.amp6_naval_towed_array;
1204                    break;
1205                case 0:
1206                default:
1207                    arrayId = R.array.amp0_unknown_array;
1208                    break;
1209            }
1210            if (arrayId == R.array.amp0_unknown_array) {
1211                ampTypeLayout.setVisibility(View.GONE);
1212            } else {
1213                ampTypeLayout.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
1214            }
1215            ArrayAdapter<CharSequence> ampTypeAdapter = ArrayAdapter.createFromResource(SymbolPickerActivity.this,
1216                    arrayId, android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item);
1217            ampTypeAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
1218            ampTypeSpinner.setAdapter(ampTypeAdapter);
1219
1220            updateSymbolPreview(); // necessary for ampCategorySpinner since this AmplifierSelectedItemListener is used instead of ModifierSpinnerListener
1221        }
1222
1223        @Override
1224        public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> adapterView) {
1225            // Auto-generated method stub
1226        }
1227    }
1228
1229    private class SearchBoxListener implements SearchView.OnQueryTextListener {
1230        private List<Node> searchSymbolTree(String searchQuery) {
1231            // Search by name
1232            List<Node> searchResults = treeManager.mil2525Tree.flatten().stream()
1233                    .filter(node -> node.getName().trim().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).replaceAll("-", " ")
1234                            .contains(searchQuery.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).replaceAll("-", " "))).collect(Collectors.toList());
1235            // Search by entity code with symbol set
1236            searchResults.addAll(treeManager.mil2525Tree.flatten().stream()
1237                    .filter(node -> (node.getSymbolSetCode() + node.getCode())
1238                            .contains(searchQuery)).collect(Collectors.toList()));
1239            // Search by entity code
1240            searchResults.addAll(treeManager.mil2525Tree.flatten().stream()
1241                    .filter(node -> node.getCode().contains(searchQuery)).collect(Collectors.toList()));
1242
1243            // Remove duplicates
1244            searchResults = searchResults.stream().distinct().collect(Collectors.toList());
1245
1246            return searchResults;
1247        }
1248
1249        @Override
1250        public boolean onQueryTextSubmit(String s) {
1251            return false;
1252        }
1253
1254        // Removes search page if query is empty or updates table with search results
1255        @Override
1256        public boolean onQueryTextChange(String s) {
1257            // Remove all pages at and below searchNode
1258            while (activeSearch) {
1259                if (pageTrail.pop().getName().equals(searchNodeName)) {
1260                    activeSearch = false;
1261                }
1262            }
1263
1264            if (s != null && !s.equals("")) {
1265                List<Node> searchResults = searchSymbolTree(s);
1266                Node searchNode = new Node(searchNodeName, "XX", "XX", "XX");
1267                searchNode.addChildren(searchResults);
1268                pageTrail.add(searchNode);
1269                activeSearch = true;
1270            }
1271            updateSymbolTable();
1272            return true;
1273        }
1274    }
1275
1276    /**
1277     * Symbol Grid View Adapter
1278     * Renders views for symbols from ArrayList of tree nodes for each page
1279     */
1280    private class SymbolGVAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<Node> {
1281        public SymbolGVAdapter(Context context, ArrayList<Node> nodeArrayList) {
1282            super(context, 0, nodeArrayList);
1283        }
1284
1285        // Gets individual view for symbol for table
1286        @Override
1287        public View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent) {
1288            Node symbolTree = getItem(position);
1289
1290            if (convertView == null) {
1291                // Layout Inflater inflates each item to be displayed in GridView
1292                convertView = LayoutInflater.from(getContext()).inflate(R.layout.symbol_cell, parent, false);
1293            }
1294            ViewGroup symbolCell = (ViewGroup) convertView;
1295
1296            // On cell click either open folder or select symbol
1297            symbolCell.setOnClickListener(view -> updateSelectedSymbol(symbolTree));
1298
1299            TextView symbolTV = symbolCell.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_cell_TV);
1300            symbolTV.setText(symbolTree.getName());
1301            // Add auto text sizing to fit longer symbol names
1302            TextViewCompat.setAutoSizeTextTypeUniformWithConfiguration(symbolTV, 8,
1303                    12, 1, TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_SP);
1304            ImageView symbolIV = symbolCell.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_cell_IV);
1305            Bitmap render = getRender(symbolTree);
1306            if (render != null)
1307                // Whether folder or leaf set icon if can render
1308                symbolIV.setImageBitmap(render);
1309            else if (!symbolTree.getChildren().isEmpty())
1310                // Can't render use folder icon
1311                symbolIV.setImageResource(R.drawable.baseline_folder_24);
1312            else
1313                // Can't render leaf node
1314                symbolIV.setImageBitmap(emptyBitmap);
1315
1316            // Add a folder icon in corner if rendering a symbol with children
1317            ImageView cellFolder = symbolCell.findViewById(R.id.symbol_picker_cell_folder);
1318            if (render != null && !symbolTree.getChildren().isEmpty())
1319                cellFolder.setImageResource(R.drawable.baseline_folder_24);
1320            else
1321                cellFolder.setImageBitmap(emptyBitmap);
1322
1323            ViewGroup.LayoutParams params = symbolCell.getLayoutParams();
1324            params.height = cellSize;
1325            params.width = cellSize;
1326            symbolCell.setLayoutParams(params);
1327
1328            return symbolCell;
1329        }
1330    }
1331
1332    private int convertStringIDtoInt(String key)
1333    {
1334        try {
1335            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1336            if (key != null & key.length() > 0)
1337            {
1338                /*for (int i = 0; i < key.length(); i++) {
1339                    String temp = String.valueOf((int) key.charAt(i));
1340                    if (temp.length() == 1)
1341                        temp = "0" + temp;
1342                    sb.append(temp);
1343                }//*/
1344                for (int i = 0; (i < 3); i++) {
1345                    String temp = String.valueOf((int) key.charAt(i));
1346                    sb.append(temp);
1347                }
1348                return Integer.parseInt(sb.toString());
1349            } else
1350                return -1;
1351        }
1352        catch(Exception exc)
1353        {
1354            System.out.println(exc.getMessage());
1355        }
1356        return -1;
1357    }
1358
1359    private String convertIntToStringID(int id)
1360    {
1361        if(id==-1)
1362            return null;
1363
1364        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1365        String tempID = String.valueOf(id);
1366        for(int i = 0; i+1 < tempID.length(); i=i+2)
1367        {
1368            int c = Integer.parseInt(tempID.substring(i,i+2));
1369
1370            sb.append(Character.toChars(c));
1371        }
1372        return sb.toString();
1373    }
1374}
